chunk:
Zohra Scientific Skincare The Glow Serum

Brand: Zohra Scientific Skincare

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Brand: Zohra Scientific Skincare

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isoamyl Laurate, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Ethyl Macadamiate, Punica Granatum Seed Oil, Squalane, Prunus Domestica Seed Oil, Carapa Guianensis Seed Oil, Bakuchiol, Tocopheryl Acetate

Directions: Apply twice a day, morning and nightly

Warnings: Do not apply around eyes

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
